name: Fyno
description:
Fyno is a modern notification infrastructure for engineering and product teams to build & manage their communication service. 
Itâ€™s like Stripe, but for communications. It comes with: 
- An integration layer to connect with any channel/cPaaS (like Twilio for SMS, Meta for WhatsApp, Firebase for Push notifications etc.);
- An orchestration layer to manage templates, configure cross-channel flows, automate communication pipelines; and 
- A robust observability layer for actionable insights. 

Fyno's feature set are malleable and modular, allowing engineering and product teams to build and manage their use-cases with limited to no coding effort. Fyno also does all the heavy lifting on the engineering front on infra scaling, throttling, managing rate limits, queueing, logs/data storage.   

To top it up, Fyno has various add-on features that ensures that you never have to look for another tool/ stack for communications.
focus_areas: Powering pro-active communications for logistics and supply chain industry
Powering secure and reliable communications for fintech and regulated companies
Providing a reliable communications infrastructure for B2B companies
